data.message:
I just really want someone to hear me about Coltons situation being dangerous it's like I am screaming into a void and everyone around me is trying to minimize or deny this placement with dan is scary.

Colton is acting out which is a bad sign. when the court removes a child they should have someone from the court a mental health expert assessing children weekly or bi monthly for mental health and emotional stress. No one keeps track of whether the children are really thriving or not after they are removed. I mean supposedly DHS does... but they dont.
